alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Harrison; Mills; Monona; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 19 at 9:52PM CDT until June 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 106. * WHERE...Portions of east central, northeast and southeast Nebraska and southwest and west central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Fremont; Harrison; Mills; Monona; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby
